content.description:
The following incomplete statement is intended to create an  ArrayList  named  theaterClub  to store  Student  objects. Assume that the  Student  class has been properly defined.
 ArrayList<Student> theaterClub = /* missing code */;
content.question: Which of the following can replace  /* missing code */  so that the statement will compile without error?

skill.text: 2.B: Write program code involving data abstractions.
